questions.text: Does your organization implement role-based access control (RBAC)?
Is multi-factor authentication (MFA) required for all privileged accounts?
Do you perform periodic access reviews?
Describe your process for revoking access when an employee leaves.
Is data at rest encrypted? Describe the algorithm used.
Is data in transit encrypted using TLS 1.2 or higher?
Do you have a formal key management policy?
Do you have a documented Incident Response Plan (IRP)?
How quickly do you notify customers of a confirmed data breach?
Is your IRP tested at least annually?
Do you conduct regular vulnerability scanning?
Do you perform penetration testing at least annually?
What is your SLA for patching Critical vulnerabilities?
Do you have a data classification policy?
Describe your data retention and deletion policies.
Are customer data backups encrypted?
Do you log and monitor access to systems containing customer data?
Do you have a formal change management process?
Do employees receive security awareness training?
Are background checks performed on employees with access to sensitive systems?
Are your data centers certified to SOC 2 or ISO 27001?
Is physical access to servers restricted to authorised personnel only?
Does your organization hold a current SOC 2 Type II report?
Is your organization certified to ISO 27001?
Are you GDPR compliant for handling EU personal data?
Do you conduct security assessments of critical sub-processors?
Do you maintain a list of sub-processors accessible to customers?
Do you have a Business Continuity Plan (BCP)?
What are your RTO and RPO commitments?
Is your BCP tested at least annually?
